video.title: The Blacklist
video.synopsis: After turning himself in, a brilliant fugitive offers to help the FBI bag other baddies, but only if rookie profiler Elizabeth Keen is his partner.

episodes.synopsis: A criminal mastermind surrenders to the FBI with a stunning offer to catch an elusive terrorist -- but he'll only talk to a specific rookie profiler.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Red track an assassin who disguises his kills in large-scale catastrophes. The Department of Justice struggles to understand Red's motives.
episodes.title: The Freelancer (No. 145)

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Red go undercover to take down an assassin who's been decimating the ranks of the CIA. Tom asks Liz about the man who attacked him.
episodes.title: Wujing (No. 84)

episodes.synopsis: When Liz's key witness disappears, Red suspects a killer who literally stews his victims, making them vanish without a trace.
episodes.title: The Stewmaker (No. 161)

episodes.synopsis: A sinister middleman with a unique ability puts the FBI on the trail of a missing NSA analyst.
episodes.title: The Courier (No. 85)

episodes.synopsis: Eager to clear Tom's name, Liz turns him in to the FBI -- but she soon discovers that he's involved with a corporate terrorist.
episodes.title: Gina Zanetakos (No. 152)

episodes.synopsis: Following a chemical attack on the subway, Liz and the team hunt down a mad scientist who used to work for the government.
episodes.title: Frederick Barnes (No. 47)

episodes.synopsis: Red is enlisted to help Liz and the FBI go after an anti-capitalist cabal that's intent on bringing the U.S. economy to its knees.
episodes.title: General Ludd (No. 109)

episodes.synopsis: An assassination attempt on Red brings the FBI under siege. Liz stealthily moves through the building to retake the facility.
episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (No. 16), Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Liz and a mysterious stranger fight to save Red and Ressler from Anslo Garrick and his Wild Bunch gang.
episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (No. 16), Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer from Liz's past strikes again while Red tenaciously hunts for his betrayer.
episodes.title: The Good Samaritan (No. 106)

episodes.synopsis: The FBI's latest target, known as the Alchemist, protects the guilty by manipulating the DNA of the innocent.
episodes.title: The Alchemist (No. 101)

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of Liz's adoption, Red puts her on the trail of an adoption agency for the wealthy that employs truly evil sourcing methods.
episodes.title: The Cyprus Agency (No. 64)

episodes.synopsis: A femme fatale from Red's past asks for his help in procuring an ancient artifact -- and leads the FBI on a snipe hunt.
episodes.title: Madeline Pratt (No. 73)

episodes.synopsis: The FBI pursues a Blacklister who metes out "justice" for those who are wrongly imprisoned.
episodes.title: The Judge (No. 57)

episodes.synopsis: As a Yakuza crime lord escapes prison and intends to get revenge on Ressler, Tom and Jolene face off.
episodes.title: Mako Tanida (No. 83)

episodes.synopsis: While chasing a cyberterrorist who has the ability to take over any system, Liz investigates Jolene's disappearance.
episodes.title: Ivan (No. 88)

episodes.synopsis: While working to uncover Tom's true identity, Liz searches for a claims adjuster who persuades ordinary people to become contract killers.
episodes.title: Milton Bobbit (No. 135)

episodes.synopsis: As the FBI searches for a Serbian family of kidnappers, Red uses them in a scheme to out Tom -- which leads to a fateful confrontation with Liz.
episodes.title: The Pavlovich Brothers (No. 119-122)

episodes.synopsis: As the FBI pursues a political fixer known as the Kingmaker, Red seeks Fitch's protection against an unknown enemy who's trying to take him down.
episodes.title: The Kingmaker (No. 42)

episodes.synopsis: After discovering the truth behind her father's death, Liz refuses to work with Red just as his situation grows desperate.
episodes.title: Berlin (No. 8)

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the Russian plane crash, Liz is forced to reunite with Red to track down Berlin.
episodes.title: Berlin (No. 8): Conclusion
